skills.description: During this card's battle, if there are cards in your Combo Area, draw 1 card and negate this skill for the duration of the battle.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may draw 3 cards and flip this card over.
When this card attacks, draw 1 card.
During this card's battle, if there are cards in your Combo Area, draw 1 card and negate this skill for the duration of the battle.
If ｛Supreme Showdown Vegeta｝ is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains +10000 power.

When your Battle Cards are placed in the Drop Area with ｛Supreme Showdown Vegeta｝'s skill, and your Leader Card is 《World Tournament》, activate this skill. If there are no ｛Supreme Showdown Son Goku｝ in your Battle Area, you may play this card from your hand.
If ｛Supreme Showdown Vegeta｝ is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains +10000 power.

When you play this card, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with 10000 or less power and KO it.
(This card can't be chosen by the skills of your opponent's cards)
If ｛Tiny Rivals Trunks｝ is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains +5000 power and <DOUBLE STRIKE> (This card inflicts 2 damage instead of 1 when attacking).
If ｛Supreme Showdown Son Goku｝ is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains +10000 power.

When you play this card, if your Leader Card is 《World Tournament》, you may choose 1 of your Battle Cards other than this card and place it in your Drop Area. If you do so, your opponent cannot activate <BLOCKER> for the duration of the turn.
If ｛Supreme Showdown Son Goku｝ is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains +10000 power.

When you play this card, if your Leader Card is 《World Tournament》, you may choose 1 of your Battle Cards other than this card and place it in your Drop Area. If you do so, your opponent cannot activate <BLOCKER> for the duration of the turn.
(You can only include up to 4 cards with <SUPER COMBO> in your deck.)

(When this card inflicts damage to your opponent's life, they place that many cards in their Drop Area instead of their hand)
If ｛Tiny Rivals Son Goten｝ is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains +5000 power and <DOUBLE STRIKE> (This card inflicts 2 damage instead of 1 when attacking).
(You can only include up to 4 cards with <SUPER COMBO> in your deck.)

When you combo with this card, if your Leader Card is red and your life is at 4 or less, you may choose 1 card in your hand and place it in your Drop Area. If you do so, this card gains +10000 combo power for the duration of the turn, then choose up to 1 red ＜Son Goten＞ and up to 1 red ＜Trunks : Youth＞, each with 15000 or less power, add them to your hand, then shuffle your deck.
When this card is switched from Active Mode to Rest Mode with {Secret Treaty Hercule}'s skill, draw 1 card.
You can combo with this card from your Battle Area even when it is in Rest Mode.
Choose this card and 1 《World Tournament》 in your Battle Area and switch them to Rest Mode : Draw 1 card.
Negate the attack, and play this card. ( <COUNTER> is activated from your hand by paying the card's energy cost)
If {Heroic Duo Son Gohan} is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains +9000 power.
When you Combo with this card, choose up to 1 of your attacking cards. It gains <DOUBLE STRIKE> (This card inflicts 2 damage instead of 1 when attacking) for the duration of the battle.
(This card can't be chosen by the skills of your opponent's cards)
When you play this card, if your Leader Card is red, choose up to 1 of your red Battle Cards with 15000 or more power and switch it to Active Mode.
(This card can't be chosen by the skills of your opponent's cards)
When you play this card, if your Leader Card is red, choose up to 1 of your red Battle Cards with 15000 or more power and switch it to Active Mode.
If {Dark Duo Babidi} is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains <BARRIER> .
When you play this card, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's hand and send them to their Warp.
When this card leaves the Battle Area, your opponent adds all cards sent to the Warp with this card's skill to their hand.
If {Dark Duo Babidi} is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains <BARRIER> .
When you play this card, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's hand and send them to their Warp.
When this card leaves the Battle Area, your opponent adds all cards sent to the Warp with this card's skill to their hand.
When you play this card, choose up to 1 card in your Battle Area and place up to 5 cards from the top of your deck under the chosen card.
(When this card inflicts damage to your opponent's life, they place that many cards in their Drop Area instead of their hand)
This card gains +5000 power for each card placed under it.

When your opponent attacks with one of their cards, place 1 card from the top of your deck under this card, then if there are 5 or more cards placed under this card, place this card in your Drop Area.
(Place and activate this card in the Battle Area. It remains in the Battle Area until you activate another <FIELD> . When you do, place this card in the Drop Area)
Switch this card to Rest Mode : Look at 1 card from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 ＜Dabura＞, ＜Pui Pui＞, or ＜Yakon＞ and add it to your hand, then place the rest on the bottom of your deck.
When this card attacks a Leader Card, draw 1 card.
When your life is at 4 or less ：You may choose up to 2 of your energy, switch them to Active Mode, and flip this card over.
When this card attacks, draw 1 card.
Choose 1 card from your life and add it to your hand : Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and return it to its owner's hand, and this card gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn.

When you play this card, if your Leader Card is 《World Tournament》, you may choose 1 {Test of Strength Uub} from your hand and play it. If you do so, both that card and this card gain +5000 power for the duration of the turn.

front.name: Son Goku & Uub, Seeds of the Future

skills.description: If your Leader Card is 《World Tournament》 and if there are 6 cards or more in both your Energy Area and your opponent's Energy Area, decrease this card's energy cost in your hand by 2.
When this card attacks, choose up to 1 card each from your opponent's Life and Energy Areas, then place them at the bottom of their owner's deck in any order.
